info.description: OAuth 2.0 compliant proxy for retrieving bearer tokens.
info.title: Security and Authorization v2

tags.name: OAuth 2.0
tags.description: This API complies with the OAuth 2.0 specification. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749

tags.name: client_id
tags.description: For client_credentials grant_type, this corresponds with a user name

tags.name: client_secret
tags.description: For client_credentials grant_type, this corresponds with a password

tags.name: grant_type
tags.description: OAuth 2.0 grant_type parameter. 'client_credentials' is currently the only supported value.

post.summary: Generate and return auth token for a given set of client credentials.

requestBody.description: A client credential OAuth 2.0 token request

401.description: Unauthorized - the client_id and/or client_secret are invalid

grant_type.description: \'client_credentials\' is currently the only supported grant_type in this API

access_token.description: Bearer token that can be used to issue calls to other APIs demonstrating authorization

expires_in.description: Number of seconds until the token is no longer valid

token_type.description: Field explicitly stating the type of access_token. (It's always a bearer token.)

error.description: Populated with the appropriate OAuth 2.0 error code. See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-5.2

error_description.description: Freeform text further explaining the nature of why the call was unsuccessful
